questions.question: What is Phoebe looking at out the window at the beginning of the episode?
options: Ugly Naked Guy decorating his tree
The Christmas tree in Central Perk
The street performers in the park
The holiday market
questions.correct_answer: Ugly Naked Guy decorating his tree
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh. Ugly Naked Guy is decorating his tree.'

questions.question: What did Monica and Rachel give the super as a gift?
options: Money
Homemade cookies
A bottle of wine
A Christmas tree
questions.correct_answer: Homemade cookies
questions.explanation: Monica says 'Oh, actually this year we just made him homemade cookies.'

questions.question: Who did Ross give a Slinky to?
options: Gunther
Joey
Chandler
Rachel
questions.correct_answer: Gunther
questions.explanation: Ross says 'Hey Gunther, you got stairs in your place?' and then gives him the Slinky.

questions.question: What is the gift that Ross got for his mom?
options: A picture frame
A blouse with medals
A pair of slippers
A cookbook
questions.correct_answer: A blouse with medals
questions.explanation: Ross holds up the blouse and says 'I got some, uh, hers and hers towels for Susan and Carol. And, uh, I got this blouse for mom.'

questions.question: What did Phoebe discover about the picture of her father?
options: It was a famous tree surgeon
It was a pharmacist
It was a picture of the guy in the frame
It was a picture of her stepdad
questions.correct_answer: It was a picture of the guy in the frame
questions.explanation: Phoebe's grandmother reveals that the picture is not of Phoebe's real father, but rather a picture of a guy in a frame.

questions.question: Why did Phoebe's grandmother not tell her the truth about her father?
options: She was trying to protect Phoebe
She was trying to hurt Phoebe
She was following her mother's wishes
She was too busy
questions.correct_answer: She was following her mother's wishes
questions.explanation: Phoebe's grandmother says 'It was your mother's idea. Ya know, she didn't want you to know your real father because it hurt her so much when he left.'

questions.question: Where does Phoebe's father allegedly live?
options: 74 Laurel Drive in Middletown
In a hut in Burma
In a pharmacy upstate
In a treehouse
questions.correct_answer: 74 Laurel Drive in Middletown
questions.explanation: Phoebe's grandmother tells her that her father lives at 74 Laurel Drive in Middletown.

questions.question: What is the reason for the heat in Monica and Rachel's apartment?
options: The radiator is broken
The air conditioner is broken
The heater is malfunctioning
The oven is on
questions.correct_answer: The radiator is broken
questions.explanation: Ross breaks the radiator knob and it cannot be fixed until Tuesday.

questions.question: What does Ross offer Mr. Treeger to fix the radiator?
options: 50 dollars
100 dollars
A plate of cookies
A Christmas tree
questions.correct_answer: 50 dollars
questions.explanation: Ross offers Mr. Treeger 50 dollars to fix the radiator, and then another 50 dollars when that doesn't work.

questions.question: What is the final outcome of Phoebe's attempt to meet her father?
options: She meets her father and they have a heartwarming reunion
She meets her father but it doesn't go well
She doesn't meet her father because she loses her nerve
She doesn't meet her father because he is not home
questions.correct_answer: She doesn't meet her father because she loses her nerve
questions.explanation: Phoebe gets as far as the mailbox but cannot bring herself to knock on the door and meet her father.

questions.question: What gift does Joey give to Rachel?
options: Wiper blades
A sweater
A pair of socks
A book
questions.correct_answer: Wiper blades
questions.explanation: Joey gives Rachel wiper blades as a gift, saying 'No, but with this new car smell, you'll think you do.'

questions.question: What is the explanation for Mr. Treeger's ability to stay cool in the hot apartment?
options: He has a lot of skin
He has a special cooling system
He is used to the heat
He is wearing special clothes
questions.correct_answer: He has a lot of skin
questions.explanation: Mr. Treeger says 'My body always stays cool, probably 'cause I have so much skin.'

questions.question: What is the reason for Phoebe's hesitation to meet her father?
options: She is afraid of what he will be like
She is angry with him for leaving
She is not interested in meeting him
She is too busy
questions.correct_answer: She is afraid of what he will be like
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'What if, what if he's not this great dad guy? I mean, what if, what if he's just still the dirtbag who ran out on my mom and us?'

questions.question: What is the outcome of Ross's attempt to 'seize the day' with Mr. Treeger?
options: Mr. Treeger fixes the radiator
Mr. Treeger refuses to fix the radiator
Ross and Mr. Treeger become friends
Ross and Mr. Treeger get into a fight
questions.correct_answer: Mr. Treeger refuses to fix the radiator
questions.explanation: Despite Ross's attempts to bribe him, Mr. Treeger refuses to fix the radiator until Tuesday.

questions.question: What is the significance of the picture frame that Ross bought?
options: It is a picture of Phoebe's father
It is a picture of Ross's family
It is a picture of a famous person
It is a random picture
questions.correct_answer: It is a picture of Phoebe's father
questions.explanation: The picture frame that Ross bought contains a picture of Phoebe's father, which Phoebe recognizes as her father.

questions.question: What is the reason for the party at Monica and Rachel's apartment?
options: It is a Christmas party
It is a birthday party
It is a New Year's Eve party
It is a going-away party
questions.correct_answer: It is a Christmas party
questions.explanation: The party is mentioned as a 'Christmas party' and the guests are dressed in holiday attire.

questions.question: What is the gift that Chandler and Joey give to Monica?
options: A pack of condoms
A sweater
A pair of socks
A book
questions.correct_answer: A pack of condoms
questions.explanation: Chandler and Joey give Monica a pack of condoms as a gift, saying 'They're ribbed for your pleasure.'

questions.question: What is the final scene of the episode?
options: Phoebe meeting her father
The gang exchanging gifts
Monica and Rachel's apartment being fixed
The party at Monica and Rachel's apartment
questions.correct_answer: The gang exchanging gifts
questions.explanation: The final scene of the episode shows the gang exchanging gifts, with Joey and Chandler giving out their gifts from a cardboard box.

questions.question: What is the reason for Phoebe's grandmother's initial hesitation to tell Phoebe the truth about her father?
options: She was trying to protect Phoebe
She was trying to hurt Phoebe
She was following her mother's wishes
She was too busy
questions.correct_answer: She was following her mother's wishes
questions.explanation: Phoebe's grandmother says 'It was your mother's idea. Ya know, she didn't want you to know your real father because it hurt her so much when he left.'

questions.question: What is the significance of the cab that Phoebe's grandmother gives her?
options: It is a special cab that will take her to her father
It is a cab that Phoebe's grandmother used to own
It is a cab that Phoebe's grandmother borrowed from someone
It is a normal cab that Phoebe's grandmother hired for Phoebe
questions.correct_answer: It is a normal cab that Phoebe's grandmother hired for Phoebe
questions.explanation: Phoebe's grandmother gives her the cab to go see her father, but it is not a special cab, just a normal one.

questions.question: What is the gift that Ross gives to Rachel at the beginning of the episode?
options: A Slinky
A sweater
A pair of socks
A book
questions.correct_answer: A Slinky
questions.explanation: Ross gives Rachel a Slinky as a gift, saying 'I, uh, got you a little present. It's a Slinky!'

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's obsession with the list that Rachel made about him?
options: He wants to prove that he is not obsessive
He wants to show that he can seize the day
He wants to make Rachel feel better
He wants to know what Rachel really thinks of him
questions.correct_answer: He wants to know what Rachel really thinks of him
questions.explanation: Ross asks Rachel to make a list about him, and when she does, he is eager to hear what she has to say.

questions.question: What is the significance of the scene where Ross is talking to the girl at the party?
options: He is trying to impress her with his gel
He is trying to make Rachel jealous
He is trying to show that he is not obsessive
He is trying to have a normal conversation
questions.correct_answer: He is trying to impress her with his gel
questions.explanation: Ross is talking to the girl at the party and mentions that he uses exactly what the gel bottle says, an amount about the size of a pea.

questions.question: What is the reason for Joey's comment about the outlet stores closing at 7?
options: He wants to go shopping
He wants to make a joke
He wants to remind Phoebe of the time
He wants to show that he is responsible
questions.correct_answer: He wants to go shopping
questions.explanation: Joey mentions that the outlet stores close at 7, implying that he wants to go shopping.

questions.question: What is the significance of the scene where Phoebe is running back to the cab?
options: She has just met her father
She has just seen her father's house
She has just gotten out of the cab
She is trying to get away from her friends
questions.correct_answer: She has just seen her father's house
questions.explanation: Phoebe is running back to the cab after seeing her father's house, implying that she has lost her nerve and does not want to meet him.

questions.question: What is the reason for Chandler's comment about the paramedics cutting through the seat belt?
options: He is trying to make a joke
He is trying to show that he is concerned about safety
He is trying to remind Phoebe of the time
He is trying to show that he is knowledgeable about cars
questions.correct_answer: He is trying to show that he is concerned about safety
questions.explanation: Chandler mentions that the paramedics had to cut through the seat belt, implying that he is concerned about safety.

questions.question: What is the significance of the scene where Ross and Monica are talking about the radiator?
options: They are trying to fix the radiator
They are trying to make a joke
They are trying to show that they are responsible
They are trying to have a normal conversation
questions.correct_answer: They are trying to fix the radiator
questions.explanation: Ross and Monica are talking about the radiator, and Ross mentions that he has broken the knob and it cannot be fixed until Tuesday.

questions.question: What is the reason for Phoebe's grandmother's comment about the phonebook?
options: She is trying to show that she is organized
She is trying to show that she is knowledgeable about phones
She is trying to remind Phoebe of the time
She is trying to make a joke
questions.correct_answer: She is trying to show that she is organized
questions.explanation: Phoebe's grandmother mentions that she is updating the phonebook, implying that she is organized and likes to keep track of things.

questions.question: What is the significance of the scene where Joey is giving out gifts?
options: He is trying to be generous
He is trying to make a joke
He is trying to show that he is responsible
He is trying to have a normal conversation
questions.correct_answer: He is trying to be generous
questions.explanation: Joey is giving out gifts to the gang, implying that he is trying to be generous and show his appreciation for his friends.
